xdi2.messaging
Class Operation

java.lang.Object
  xdi2.messaging.Operation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Operation>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddOperation, DelOperation, GetOperation, ModOperation
public abstract class Operation
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<Operation>

An XDI messaging operation, represented as a relation.

Author:
markus
See Also:
